app_description: Ultimate Fast and Powerful TALKING French Dictionary and Translator French Persian Farsi French English Persian French LISTEN AND LEARN French WITH WORDS PRONUNCIATIONS PREMIUM TEXT TRANSLATION FRENCH PERSIAN PERSIAN FRENCH Your best assistant if you need to tell something to other people in opposite language Professional Native Talking and pronunciations. Easy to use Including over 195 000 words. Over 20 specific categories Intelligent relative words navigation Designed for iPhone 3G 3GS 4 4S Designed for iPod 2G iPod Touch 3G 4G Designed for iPad iPad2 iPad3 Optimized for Retina Display Landscape Portrait view mode support Intelligent translation without need to set input language Presents Word of A Day feature to help you memorize new words Disclaimer: THE TRANSLATION FEATURE IS PROVIDED BY PREMIUM ONLINE TRANSLATE SERVICE SO THE ACCURACY OF THE TRANSLATION RESULT IS NOT GUARANTEED BY THIS APP. NONE OF MACHINE TRANSLATION SYSTEM IN THE WORLD ARE 100 ACCURATE BUT WE DO OUR BEST TO INTEGRATE THE MOST POWERFULL ONES IN OUR APP Version 3.7 Change Log: 170 000 New French Persian French English words added.
